True structure of Prussian Blue was Fe[FeFe(CN)6]3 and soluble prussian blue is when theres so much prusside ions that Fe doesnt have to enter coordination sphere.
Litmus is adsorbed on Al(OH)3 by surface complexation giving the precipitate colour
SO4 cant oxidize S, they are extremum of the same element
By HSAB, Calcium Chromate ppt is not formed. This is why CH3COOH is poured before doing test for Barium. (CH3COOH is already at acid and no oxidized)
Unlike Ba, CaC2O4 is insoluble and confirms that its Ca
